data.title: Patty's Place Memory Wall
data.meta_description: Love has helped make Patty’s Place possible. Love for wives, husbands, parents, friends has been the foundation for this incredible centre.   To honour the lives of the loved ones we’ve lost, please fill out the following information and upload a high-quality photo of your loved one to be included on the Memory Wall in…
data.text:
Love has helped make Patty’s Place possible. Love for wives, husbands, parents, friends has been the foundation for this incredible centre.

To honour the lives of the loved ones we’ve lost, please fill out the following information and upload a high-quality photo of your loved one to be included on the Memory Wall in the lobby of Patty’s Place.

We can also list your loved one’s name on our memory wall without a photo. If you prefer both, we can also include BOTH the photo and name of your loved one. Please let us know in the comment section of the form below.

If you require assistance, please contact Suzanne Vu via email at [email protected] or via phone at 289-795-1172.

Your name(Required)

First Last

Phone

Email(Required)

Name of your loved one(Required)

First Last

Please upload a high-quality photo of your loved one

Max. file size: 40 MB.

Any other comments?
